body: To be completely honest it's his fault 🤷‍♂️
This is depressing for the point of being depressing.

I don’t hate netorare at all, quite the opposite but I can’t stand one’s like this, depressing for no reason. Something I love about Hentai is the fact it’s not realistic but literally what is the point in this, in what world would you want your best friend to watch you fuck you girl who he is also close with and most likely likes??? Some depressing ones can be done well, like entanglement is fantastic but makes me feel like shit so I don’t really go back to it but it’s done well but this? Fuck man
Ohhhhhh why just why, this is trash, my souls has been destroyed by this manga 😫
good thing but what a point of dude watching them?

This is pretty stupid because it's wrong on all sides. GF got rejected and almost immediately asks the best friend. It really just seems like she was in a rush to get fucked. Pretty sure both would've been cucked by a rando if they both declined. MC got asked out by the GF and declines but somehow doesn't seem sad enough to decline watching his crush get fucked by his best friend. Best friend is dense as fuck and for some reason doesn't know how to read the situation. In conclusion, 2/3 characters (if not, all) know what the fuck is going on, but they're still letting it happen to make ONE person happy. Anyone in their right mind, would've declined being an observer and moved on and if they asked why, the only appropriate answer would be "if you don't know why, I think it's best we stop hanging out." because hanging out with friends that are dense as paper gets super annoying and tiring very quick.

Mc is a bitch why reject when u always loved her & she took all the courage to confess too. u want her to end up with a better guy than u yeah she ended up with a player who fucked bunch of girls u get shunned by her family cuz u rejected her & he might actually fuck her sisters too u bet. It depends if he will marry her or not while u will remain in a hell where u will see the girl u loved get fucked for 3 hours everyday & 7 hours on weekends bc of that shit observer rule also when it isn't his first time he could have taken action & said that he want him to find someone better than a guy like this or he reflected on his action & actually loves her so choose between him & me if u choose him will not be the observer u can do whatever u want but if u choose me he can be our observer. If she chooses u & that guy refuse to become observer bring the sisters. He could have gotten a harem but chose to be a virgin while that guy will fuck all girls in that house

The mc’s actions of rejecting her, sadly reminds me of myself, except for the part that a bff took a girl a like as a girlfriend, and the fact that a girl confessed to me, no what reminds me of me is the fact that I push a girl’s advances from me becuase I have zero self esteem, i don’t feel deserving of being loved, seemingly the sales as the mc, about being afraid of ruining their friendship, well to me I’m more like afraid of making the girl i date sad in the future, but even at that there’s no one else to blame but yourself, so yeah true you rep what you sow, and it’s normal that ppl that has that kind of mindset won’t be able to achieve happiness or love easily, it’s nearly impossible in fact, so the only thing you can do is to apologise and support those around you, and luckily they’ll forgive you and leave the past in the past, and for that reason is to have friends, to be honest  I would try being friends with the boyfriend, in other to actually be forgiven by everyone else

for those wondering why the mc rejected her, not really bc he's a pussy or a retard, it's just that he felt like he didn't deserve/could support or make her feel happy in the long run, he just felt like someone else would be better for her, even if it meant abandoning his love for her, but oh plot twist, ass hole buff guy comes in and starts to ruin the fuck out of a wholesome girl, so all the mc did was make the right move in HIS opinion, but luck wasn't on his side. now, you horny virgins probably don't know this, but you can't just go for any girl out there and expect your future to be happy ever after, they might be childhood friends, but that doesn't mean they will stay all friendly forever. let's say the mc can't afford or support their family? then everything will fail n shit. he just made the right move, he isn't retarded, he plays it safe.

What a fucking dumbass!  Jesus fucking christ.  I saw the second entry under the popular selections and as usual I read all 5.  But since this one was a sequel, I decided to find the first to see how the fuck this dude ended up having to watch the girl he likes get fucked by someone else. Firstly, I did not expect it to be done weird alternate universe cultural thing.  Secondly, this idiot turned down her confession, said the would be be her observer, and then when she found someone to have sex with (cause she's hot as shit with huge tits), he starts getting all up in his feelings?  I don't think there's ever been a character in any NTR that wasn't a massive douche more deserving of being NTRed then this pussy.

The dude is an idiot. Why does someone else have to wait around for when you’re ready? If some girl you ask out says let’s stay friends and then some other pretty thing turns up and wants a real relationship and values your feelings, are you obligated to wait around for the first girl? Who’s to say the first girl will ever be interested.

So he had feelings for her and rejected her confession because he "didn't want her to change?" He's literally, actually, unironically braindead. At least the story is kinda original, but that's such a dumb and contrived way to kick off a NTR.
Let this be a lesson.. Don't let a girl wait to long. Or the Mc might be you.
